DOC.brief_summary: Pre-eclampsia one common cause maternal fetal morbidity mortality . The aim study identify pregnant woman risk pre-eclampsia cardiovascular complication early state disease , thereby improve current method screening .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Pregnant Women With Hypercoagulopathy
DOC.detailed_description: 600 pregnant woman include project follow standardized manner pregnancy . On regular basis blood- urine sample take throughout pregnancy 1 month delivery analyze large variety coagulation factor order identify factor might predict increase risk develop pre-eclampsia and/or cardiovascular event . In addition DNA-sample take consented order evaluate genetic factor .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman attend midwife Hilleroed Hospital , Frederiksborg County , Denmark . Mental disease . Problems understand read Danish .
